changeSet.sql:
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW readable.location_context AS SELECT lc.id, lc.name, lc.description, lc.notes, res.name AS research, lc.pinned, r.name AS updated_by, lc.update_date FROM ruleform.location_context lc LEFT JOIN ruleform.research res ON lc.research = res.id JOIN ruleform.resource r ON lc.updated_by = r.id;
ALTER TABLE readable.location_context OWNER TO core;
